Reviews.Title: “Poor customer service is just the tip of the iceberg.”

Reviews.Content: ive reported hotel corporate office staff belligerent disrespectful management bad spoke manager avail choice corporate level maids clean week lie cleaning didnt happened multiple times otherwise excuse theyre pet friendly theyre cat consistently refused maid service essentially clean ourselves beforehand grain litter food floor grounds refusal involving pet isnt maids responsibility clean according rules rates outrageous poor service lack amenities laundry isnt functional time wifi speed plus location happens crime ridden car broken stay weve seen police times count
